page.title: 01A PICTURE OF NE. PLYMOUTH
page.content: Our area is NE from the centre of Plymouth.Most of the land within the twelve square km is{hilly.}There are many{housing estates}with different types of houses,like council,private & some trust housing in the Austin Farm/Eggbuckland area.The Estover estate is the newest.Some old cottages from 18/19cent.remain.There are {facilities:}Shopping,Medical,Emergency Educational,Religious,Recreational. {Features:}Manadon College Chapel mentioned in the Domesday Book;Forts built in the 1960's & the Parkway + Interchange with roads leading to the city centre,Cornwall & Exeter.In NE & SE corners 2 light indust.areas.There are many{open green spaces}of former farms,though these are disappearing. Blunts Lane is one of the remaining lanes in the area.Plymbridge is still an area of{natural beauty.
